channel.title: Drumming on The Practice Room
channel.description: Recent content in Drumming on The Practice Room

item.title: A Concise Guide to a Quality Percussion Practice Routine
item.description: A Concise Guide to a Quality Percussion Practice Routine EJ Barasona So there I was, eating my Frankie’s Pizza when suddenly I was approached by none other than Andrew McAllister, asking me to write a blog post about how to practice percussion. This got me thinking about whether there really is an ideal practice routine. The answer is that one person’s strategy that gives them excellent progress may not be the perfect strategy for someone else in a different situation.
